name: Helping a Toaster
description:
Enter Toasteve the toaster's realm of terror, where any kitchen appliance is readily available.  Sadly for Toasteve, he is a toaster, and therefore has no hands to use the appliances.

This is why you must help Toasteve by making him some spaghetti. Unfortunately for you, Toasteve is a very hungry and impatient toaster, and he will attempt to eat you if you waste too much time.
